channel.title: Rapplez
channel.description:
Well hallu der, welcome to my thread. I've brought up the discussion of [url=http://rappelz.gpotato.com/?gclid=CNaD54qA_40CFREDWAod2Qv4LQ]Rapplez[/url] because I see this banner all the time here on Moparisthebest, and I was wonder is it a good game? I'm sure somebody here has played it by now, the banner has been here for a few months.
So for the ones here who have played it, whats your take on this game? Is it good or bad? Fun or boring? Failure at graphics? Let me know.

item.title: Rapplez
item.dc:creator: @bakatool bakatool
item.description:
@bakatool wrote:

quit at lvl 50 it gets impossible to level even in the dungeon… you can’t level without parties and pking makes your name red… and you will have to fight monsters higher level and solo kill them which makes your pk points go down so your name wont be red… thing is… killing monsters higher than your own level is very hard… its one of those games where u have to grind 24\7 to just get 1 level up. waste of time…

when game came out it was fun… cuz there was 2 exploits going around where you could hit 65534 damage and kill most monsters in one hit, another exploit gave you level 255 buffs which were insane defense buffs attack buffs you could give to pets and your pets would level up very fast… but it got leaked and both patched next 3 days.

Read full topic

i played it a while ago. it was pretty fun, but i think Flyff and space cowboy(both made by Gpotato, the company that made rappelz) are better.
